beak.methods.som.load_geotiff module

Created on Fri Jul 5 09:46:21 2019 Script for reading geotiff input data files. @author: shautala

beak.methods.som.load_geotiff.load_geotiff_files(input_file_list, label_file='')[source]

Load data and meta data of geotiff files using gdal

Parameters:

  • input_file_list (LiteralString) – input file paths, separated by komma

  • label_file (LiteralString, optional) – label file paths, separated by komma. Defaults to “”.

Returns:

dictionary holding the data as a stacked ndarray and meta data such as geo transform, numer of rows and column, no data value, column (data) names

Return type:

dict

beak.methods.som.load_geotiff.delete_rows_with_no_data(geotiff_header)[source]

Delete rows from ndarray that contain noData values. Data and rows count of ndarray is updated and returned as a dictionary with same format as input dictionary.

Parameters:

geotiff_header (dict) – dictionary holding the data as a stacked ndarray and meta data such as geo transform, numer of rows and column, no data value, column (data) names

Returns:

dictionary holding the data as a stacked ndarray and meta data such as geo transform, numer of rows and column, no data value, column (data) names

Return type:

dict

beak.methods.som.load_geotiff.read_geotiff_coordinate_columns(geotiff_header)[source]

Read coordinate columns from dictionary

Parameters:

geotiff_header (dict) – dictionary holding the data as a ndarray and meta data, such as numer of rows and column, column (data) names, file type

Returns:

dictionary holding coordinates as a ndarray, column names and format

Return type:

dict

beak.methods.som.load_geotiff.read_geotiff_data_columns(geotiff_header)[source]

Read data columns from dictionary

Parameters:

geotiff_header (dict) – dictionary holding the data as a stacked ndarray and meta data such as geo transform, numer of rows and column, no data value, column (data) names

Returns:

dictionary holding data columns as a ndarray, column names and format

Return type:

dict
